trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP fault when SOAP version 1.2 is used to communicate between a client and an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Representa o conteúdo do opcional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""> </xref> elemento de uma falha SOAP ao SOAP versão 1.2 é usado para comunicação entre um cliente e um serviço Web XML.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP 1.2 fault contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Uma falha de SOAP 1.2 contém um `Code` elemento e, dentre outras coisas um opcional `Subcode` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: O `Code` elemento Especifica o tipo de erro que ocorreu usando um número limitado de códigos de erro predefinidos especificado pelo protocolo SOAP, enquanto o `Subcode` elemento permite que o remetente da falha de SOAP fornecer um código de erro específico do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa o conteúdo do `Subcode` elemento.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services return a SOAP fault by throwing a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> and.NET clients receive a SOAP fault by catching a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>.
trans-unit.target: Os XML Web services retornam uma falha de SOAP, lançando um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>and.NET clientes recebem uma falha SOAP capturando <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> has the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property representing the `Code` element and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property representing the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>tem o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade que representa o `Code` elemento e o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>propriedade que representa o `Subcode` elemento.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> class sets the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>classe define o código de erro específico do aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>especificando o código de erro específico do aplicativo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> class setting the application specific error code and additional error information.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> classe definindo o código de erro específico do aplicativo e as informações de erro adicionais.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>especificando o código de erro específico do aplicativo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> specifying additional application specific error information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> especificando informações de erro específicas de aplicativo adicionais.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the application specific error code in the form of an XML qualified name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código de erro específico do aplicativo na forma de um nome qualificado XML.

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use um construtor para definir o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A> property can be any user defined XML qualified name, including the codes represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>propriedade pode ser qualquer definida pelo usuário nome qualificado de XML, incluindo os códigos representados pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode>campos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> representing the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>que representa o código de erro específico do aplicativo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional error information contained within a child <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações de erro adicionais dentro de um filho <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use um construtor para definir o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A> property allows an XML Web service to provide nested error information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>propriedade permite que um serviço Web XML fornecer informações de erro aninhado.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for providing an error code specific to the XML Web service while passing along error information returned from components the XML Web service called.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para fornecer um código de erro específico do serviço Web XML ao passar ao longo de informações de erro retornado de componentes do serviço Web XML chamado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> containing additional error information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>que contém informações de erro adicionais.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>
